segments.text: What's the problem ? You don't look happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you go to the English corner to talk to your classmates in English quite often ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I talk to Chinese , I always want to speak Chinese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should always keep in mind , the more you practice , the better English you can speak .
segments.speaker: S1
